recipe.title: Green Beans with Za'atar and Lemon
ingredients: 2 pounds thin green beans (haricot verts), stem ends trimmed
instructions: In large skillet over medium-high heat, bring the broth to a simmer. Add the green beans, cover pan, and cook, tossing occasionally, until crisp-tender, 5 to 7 minutes. Uncover pan and add butter; toss to coat. Remove pan from heat and stir in the za'atar, lemon zest, salt and pepper to taste before serving.

In large skillet over medium-high heat, bring the broth to a simmer. Add the green beans, cover pan, and cook, tossing occasionally, until crisp-tender, 5 to 7 minutes. Uncover pan and add butter; toss to coat.
Remove pan from heat and stir in the za'atar, lemon zest, salt and pepper to taste before serving.
